last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: Yohan throws a last-minute curveball in a plan that ensured Ingu’s safety. Lee Sangjun arrives at the airport as the crackdown on Yohan’s empire begins.

name: Narco-Saints
overview: An ordinary entrepreneur joins a secret government mission to capture a Korean drug lord operating in South America.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: To secure a better future, Kang Ingu goes to Suriname to run a fishery with a friend. It’s all smooth sailing until he falls into a trap and ends up in jail. A government agent comes to Ingu's aid — but in return, he must help reel in a drug lord.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Kang Ingu goes to scope out the factory for his potential new business venture, but finds himself caught in a turf war. A local pastor offers his help.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Reluctant to hire a lawyer, Ingu considers a deal proposed by a secret agent. He expands his influence in prison, hoping to trick an ex-bodyguard.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Ingu mediates a partnership between Jeon Yohan and Goo Sangman. Yohan does his due diligence before committing to the trade.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: A conflict at the border shifts the dynamics within Yohan’s inner circle. Sangman proposes a different route to Korea.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Unable to convince Yohan to take the new route, Ingu improvises by coming up with a solution of his own. David Julio Park prepares a handoff.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Yohan throws a last-minute curveball in a plan that ensured Ingu’s safety. Lee Sangjun arrives at the airport as the crackdown on Yohan’s empire begins.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: To secure a better future, Kang Ingu goes to Suriname to run a fishery with a friend. It’s all smooth sailing until he falls into a trap and ends up in jail. A government agent comes to Ingu's aid — but in return, he must help reel in a drug lord.
